text: Mikhail Sergeyevich Tolstykh (; July 19, 1980 - February 8, 2017), better known by his callsign Givi (Ги́ви), was a Ukrainian commander in the pro- Russian Somalia Battalion in the War in Donbas. He served as Lieutenant colonel.Lt. Col. Givi prepares "surprise" for Ukrainian troops. Novorossia TV. 1 December 2014. Retrieved 21 January 2015. On February 16, 2015, Tolstykh was included by the European Council in their sanctions list. Tolstykh was killed on February 8, 2017, in Donetsk, Ukraine by a rocket launcher explosion, aged 36. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Assassinated Ukrainian people Category:Colonels Category:Ukrainian military people
title: Mikhail Tolstykh
